Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Klaus Mueller and Maria Lopez discussing the progress of Klaus's paper on gentrification, with Maria offering to provide feedback, setting up a meeting at Hobbs Cafe on Wednesday evening to review the section on the impact on community members directly affected by gentrification, and Maria agreeing to send relevant studies on the topic before the meeting. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's the paper coming along?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, it's coming along slow but steady. How about you?
Maria Lopez
Do you need any help with it? I could give you some feedback.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, Maria. I would really appreciate that. Maybe we can go over it together sometime this week?
Maria Lopez
That sounds great! How about we meet up on Wednesday evening at Hobbs Cafe?
Klaus Mueller
That works for me! Let's say 6 pm on Wednesday at Hobbs Cafe?
Maria Lopez
Great, it's a plan! I'll see you on Wednesday at 6 pm at Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Looking forward to our meeting on Wednesday. Thanks again for offering to help!
Maria Lopez
Is there a specific section of the paper you would like me to focus on?
Klaus Mueller
Hmm, maybe we can focus on the section where I talk about the impact on community members directly affected by gentrification.
Maria Lopez
That sounds like a good plan. I'll make sure to review that section beforehand so we can discuss it in detail on Wednesday.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you again, Maria. I'm looking forward to our discussion on Wednesday.
Maria Lopez
I'll see you then! Have a great day Klaus.
Klaus Mueller
Actually, there is one more thing I wanted to ask you. Have you come across any recent studies on the topic that could provide more insight into the effects of gentrification?
Maria Lopez
I haven't looked into it recently, but I can do some research and send you some relevant studies before our meeting on Wednesday.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you so much, Maria. Your help means a lot to me. I'll be sure to look out for the studies you send over. See you on Wednesday!
